title: Review: In ‘Topdog/Underdog,’ Staying Alive Is the Ultimate Hustle
description: A latter-day Lincoln and Booth try to survive the American dream in a hilarious, harrowing and superbly acted Broadway revival of the Suzan-Lori Parks play.
dc:creator: Jesse Green
media:description: Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, left, as Booth, and Corey Hawkins as Lincoln in the Pulitzer Prize-winning play “Topdog/Underdog” at the Golden Theater in Manhattan.
